Text:
We will never know exactly; the tragedy of Frank
Rosolino or exactly what happened....a suicide pact?.....It's really not as interesting as the excellent music he made......the music is what matters most.....is it not?
I forgot to mention that the BASS on this album is overblown...boomy...flaccid...luckily there's no sign of the cheesy reverb which marred so many otherwise excellent albums from the '50s

thanks froogAL!  you're right, the bass is a bit boomy but easily overlooked.  Excellent recording and performance!  I have the album recorded in Toronto by Don Thompson with Sweet And Lovely, and Who Can I Turn To.  Frank certainly gets around the horn.  Thanks for the post.  Cheers.
